verses.name: 1 Samuel 29:4
verses.text: And the princes of the Philistines were wroth with him; and the princes of the Philistines said unto him, Make this fellow return, that he may go again to his place which thou hast appointed him, and let him not go down with us to battle, lest in the battle he be an adversary to us: for wherewith should he reconcile himself unto his master? should it not be with the heads of these men?

verses.name: 1 Samuel 29:5
verses.text: Is not this David, of whom they sang one to another in dances, saying, Saul slew his thousands, and David his ten thousands?
